description: [Green Lambert](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0690) can add init.d and rc.d files in the /etc folder to establish persistence.(Citation: Objective See Green Lambert for OSX Oct 2021)(Citation: Glitch-Cat Green Lambert ATTCK Oct 2021)
